thread.section_title: Arsenal dealt fresh Santi Cazorla injury blow – Metro
thread.title: Arsenal dealt fresh Santi Cazorla injury blow
thread.title_full: Arsenal dealt fresh Santi Cazorla injury blow

author: markbrus88
title: Arsenal dealt fresh Santi Cazorla injury blow
text:
Santi Cazorla needs a second operation (Picture: Getty) Arsenal have been dealt the blow that Santi Cazorla reportedly needs a second operation on an ankle problem that has kept him out for much of the season.
The Spanish playmaker started the campaign brightly for the Gunners, and has been a big loss since picking up the problem back in October.
Costa to China? 5 realistic replacements Chelsea could sign this January Arsene Wenger has not been clear on when the 32-year-old would return, but his latest comments suggest it is more bad news for Arsenal fans hoping to see the fan-favourite back soon.
‘Santi had a little procedure and we have a meeting with the medical people to see what it was really,’ Wenger said.
‘Certainly he will not be available in the next six weeks that is for sure.’
More: Football Mourinho shows he's MADE for Man Utd job with perfect dig at Liverpool 
Wenger did, however, seem slightly optimistic that Cazorla would play again for Arsenal this season, saying: ‘I hope so because once you start to go out, you have to count six weeks preparation.
‘At the moment he is not at that level. Let’s hope he can come back in the next three or four weeks on the pitch.’
MORE: Mesut Ozil urged to score more goals by Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger
